text: Vanhorniidae is a family parasitic wasps in the order Hymenoptera. There are only two extant genera, Heloriserphus and Vanhornia.Moon Bo Choi, Jong Wook Lee (2012) First record of Vanhorniidae (Hymenoptera: Proctotrupoidea) from Korea. Journal of Asia-Pacific Entomology 15: 59-61. https://doi.org/10.1016/j.aspen.2011.08.003. ==References== ==Further reading== * * * * * * * * Category:Proctotrupoidea
title: Vanhorniidae
